Try adding chopped toasted nuts, minced tender herbs, spices (such as cumin, turmeric, or coriander), and/or finely chopped dried fruit (like raisins, apricots, and/or dates).IngredientsMakes about 1½ cups1½cups plain whole-milk Greek yogurt1Tbsp. fresh lemon juice1tsp. kosher saltPreparationMix yogurt, lemon juice, and salt in a small bowl to combine.
